name: The Old Prison Demo
description:
After a trip you decided to take with your friend to discover an old prison outside your town, it ended with the death of your friend and your imprisonment in that prison. You have two choices, either to survive with your life or to meet your death like your friend.

to survive you must solve the prison puzzles and mysteries, and run away from the prison guard that no one can escape from him.

If you want to have a scary time, play The Old Prison and try to escape from the prison.

It is recommended to play with headphones for a better experience.

Let us know what you thought in the comments!

  • Experience real survival horror

    You are not a fighter - if you want to survive the horrors of the prison, your only chance is to run...or hide from the guard.

  • Immersive Graphics

    AAA-quality graphics give players a detailed, terrifying world to explore.

  • Challenging puzzles

    The game is a puzzle base that the player needs to solve to escape from the scary prison.

  • Localization
